===========================
confluent_kafka_connect_cli
===========================


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/confluent_kafka_connect_cli.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/confluent_kafka_connect_cli

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/aidan-melen/confluent_kafka_connect_cli.svg

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/confluent-kafka-connect-cli/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://confluent-kafka-connect-cli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest

Make it easier to interact with the confluent kafka connect REST api.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://confluent-kafka-connect-cli.readthedocs.io.
